item.title: The WLFI associated address spent 18.6 million U to buy 1911 ETH and 84.5 WBTC.
item.description: On August 16th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, an address associated with WLFI spent 18.6 million USDC to acquire 1911 ETH (amounting to 8.6 million USD, with an average price of 4500 USD) and 84.5 WBTC (equivalent to 10 million USD, having an average price of 118,343 USD). The wallet still holds 5 million USDC and there is a possibility of making further purchases.

item.title: A certain UNI Whale transaction address has increased its position by 115,000 UNI to lower the average price, with a total position value of $6.26 million.
item.description: On August 16th, according to on-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa), it was observed that the address beginning with 0x4B5 swapped 1090 ETH for 415,005 UNI during the uptrend of ETH on August 13th. Subsequently, during a sharp decline, the address purchased an additional 115,005 UNI 10 hours ago to reduce the average cost, accumulating a total position worth $6.26 million of UNI. The current average cost is $11.82, resulting in an unrealized loss of $535,000.

item.title: Yesterday, Grayscale ETHE saw a net outflow of $100 million, while GBTC saw a net outflow of $81.8 million.
item.description: On August 16th, based on the monitoring of Farside Investors, yesterday Grayscale ETHE witnessed a net outflow of $101.7 million, and GBTC experienced a net outflow of $81.8 million.

item.title: Gemini IPO Details Revealed: Stock Ticker Symbol is GEMI, First-Half Loss of $2.825 Billion in 2022 Far Exceeds Prior Year
item.description: August 16th: On Friday, the cryptocurrency exchange Gemini officially made its S-1 filing public. It was revealed that the registration statement was submitted confidentially as early as the beginning of June.The filing indicates that Gemini is applying to list on the Nasdaq Stock Market under the stock symbol "GEMI". Although the IPO price range has not been disclosed, it has been confirmed that Goldman Sachs, Citigroup, Morgan Stanley, and Cantor are serving as lead underwriters. The assets on the Gemini platform exceed $18 billion. In the first half of this year, transaction-based trading revenue accounted for 65.5% of Gemini's revenue.The financial data reveals a more difficult operating situation for Gemini than previously known: a net loss of $282.5 million in the first half of 2025, which is a significant increase from the $41.4 million loss in the same period last year. Adjusted EBITDA deteriorated from a profit of $32 million in the same period last year to a loss of $113.

item.title: Web3 Security Infrastructure GoPlus Announces Full API Support for Transaction Simulation Feature
item.description: August 16th. Web3 security infrastructure GoPlus announced that its Security API now completely supports transaction simulation functionality. The transaction simulation API integrates a multi-dimensional security analysis model and a precision risk control system. It can offer real-time transaction simulation and security detection and is equipped with an on-chain blacklist system. This feature can be widely utilized in various Web3 products like wallet applications, DApps, cross-chain bridges, aggregators, and Web3 browsers.As the world's most widely used Web3 security infrastructure, GoPlus has an advanced AI-driven real-time, dynamic, and automated security detection engine. GoPlus currently supports most mainstream EVM chains (such as ETH, BSC, Base) as well as Solana, etc. It provides multiple API services including Token security detection, malicious address detection, NFT security detection, authorization security detection, Permit phishing signature detection, dApp security

item.title: An address newly created 13 hours ago has once again withdrawn 17,300 ETH from Kraken.
item.description: On August 16th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet address has carried out multiple transactions within the past 13 hours. It has once again withdrawn 17,381 ETH from Kraken, with a total value of $76.9 million. This address has now withdrawn a cumulative total of 34,973 ETH from Kraken, amounting to $154 million.

item.title: Yesterday, Fidelity FETH saw a net outflow of $272 million
item.description: On August 16th, as monitored by Farside Investors, yesterday Fidelity's Ethereum spot ETF FETH experienced a net outflow of $272.2 million. This was the first net outflow since August 5th.

item.title: Grayscale Submits S-1 Filing for DOGE ETF to SEC
item.description: On August 16th, based on official data, Grayscale has submitted the S-1 application document for a DOGE ETF to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.

item.title: A new address withdrew 4492 ETH from Kraken half an hour ago.
item.description: On August 16th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the new address 0x5ef...Fa96F withdrew 4492 ETH from Kraken half an hour ago. The amount withdrawn is approximately $20.01 million, and the average withdrawal price is $4453.6 per ETH.

item.title: Bitmine (BMNR) has once again increased its holdings by 135,000 ETH in the past 10 hours, bringing the total holdings to 1,297,000 ETH.
item.description: August 16th. Based on on-chain data analyst Yujin, the US publicly listed company Bitmine (BMNR) has continuously increased its holdings by 135,135 ETH in the past 10 hours through three institutional business platforms such as FalconX, Galaxy Digital, and BitGo. The total value of these holdings is $600 million. Their total ETH reserve has now reached 1.297 million ETH, with a value of $5.77 billion.
